name: Bicycle, Bicycle Biggie box bag
description:
This huge box shaped bag is is almost three times the size of a regular box bag. It's big enough to hold an entire sweater project - both the yarn and the sweater itself!

It measures approximately 12" x 7" and is 4.5" tall. The outside is a printed canvas reinforced with a sturdy interfacing and matched with a coordinating zipper. The inside seams are all professionally finished with a neat serged edge. I take a lot of pride in everything I sew, so you can always rest assured that you'll get straight seams and well executed finishing details.

Be sure to check the shop for a wee or long pouch in the same fabric. Doesn't get any cuter than matchy-matchy pouches! 

Thanks and happy shopping!
Caro

name: Bicycle, Bicycle box bag
description:
This long box shaped bag is perfect for a smaller knitting project. It's big enough to hold two balls of yarn and a sock or sleeve or a scarf WIP. Or use it as a lunch bag with plenty of room for a beverage, a sammy and some fruit.

It measures approximately 8" x 4" and is 4" tall. The outside is a printed canvas reinforced with a sturdy interfacing and matched with a coordinating zipper. The inside seams are all professionally finished with a neat serged edge. I take a lot of pride in everything I sew, so you can always rest assured that you'll get straight seams and well executed finishing details.

name: Matryoshka SLR Camera Strap
description:
Who wants to walk around with a boring old black camera strap emblazoned with the camera brand name? Pfft! Get yourself a fancified, way hipper, cool strap.

Each camera strap comes with plastic hardware to adjust the length to the size you want it. The fabric portion is approximately 23" long. Including the nylon webbing, you can adjust the strap to be approximately 50" long once it's on your camera. The webbing is 3/8" wide and will fit most SLR cameras. The fabric itself is 1 and 5/8" wide to ease the camera load on your shoulders.

All my camera straps are handmade with the utmost of care to design placement and seams. I take a lot of pride in everything I sew, so you can always rest assured that you'll get straight seams and well executed finishing details.

If you'd like to upgrade shipping to Priority Mail in the US or Global Priority Mail for international, just ping me when you're all finished shopping and I'll send along a new invoice for the difference.

Thanks and happy shopping!
Caro

name: Bicycle, Bicycle wee zip notions pouch
description:
This wee zippered pouch is perfect for all those fiddly knitting notions that seem to rattle around the bottom of your knitting bag. Stitch markers, yarn cutters, a spare tapestry needle and point protectors. Or use it as a wallet with plenty of room for credit cards and some coinage.

It measures approximately 4.5" x 3.25". The outside is 100% cotton printed canvas reinforced with a sturdy interfacing and matched with a coordinating zipper. The inside seams are all professionally finished off with a neat serged edge. I take a lot of pride in everything I sew, so you can always rest assured that you'll get straight seams and well executed finishing details.

Be sure to check the shop for a long pouch in the same fabric. Doesn't get any cuter than matchy-matchy pouches! 

If you'd like to upgrade shipping to Priority Mail in the US or Global Priority Mail for international, just ping me when you're all finished shopping and I'll send along a new invoice for the difference.

Thanks and happy shopping!
Caro
